input.sentences: i was making dinner last week and i decided to make a huge meal .
i bought a lot of meat .
i cooked it in a pan .
i also made a lot of rice .
after it was all done i had a great meal .
output.sentences: This week, I have to make a huge meal for my extended family.
I bought a lot of meat.
I cooked it in a pan until it turned golden brown.
I also made a lot of rice to go with it,
When I was done cooking, I had a meal that the whole family could enjoy.
